title: Display,L, Preamble, XL
code:
<gds-flex width="100%" padding="s; 3xl {m}; 6xl {l}" flex-direction="column" align-items="center" gap="2xl">
  <gds-text text-align="center " font="display-s; display-m {m}; display-l {l}">Climate change is the greatest and most urgent challenge.
  </gds-text>
  <gds-text color="neutral-02" text-align="center " font="preamble-xl; preamble-l {m}; preamble-m {s}">We have committed to the Paris Agreement by the signing of the UNEP FI Principles for Responsible Banking, and one of the founding signatories of the Net-Zero Banking Alliance and the Net Zero Asset Managers initiative.
  </gds-text>
  <gds-badge variant="notice">2XL (32)</gds-badge>
</gds-flex>
